title: Keep Busing Migrants to DC | Guest: James Lindsay | 4/14/22
description:
Glenn starts off the show by discussing the horrific footage from Shanghai, as citizens are killing themselves due to starvation and animals are being killed to “protect” them from COVID-19. Glenn discusses the decline of the Chinese government as it turned to communism. Glenn goes into part three of his series seeking to find America’s god, this time focusing on wokeism being more than a religion: It's a cult. Author James Lindsay joins to discuss the cult dynamics of wokeism. Glenn discusses Texas Governor Greg Abbott sending buses of migrants to Washington, D.C., as more buses are being planned.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
